aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Aquilon
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: The Glacier Forge Pokémon. A legendary bear of living, primordial ice and stone, said to have carved the fjords of Aethel with its immense strength. Its roar is the sound of a glacier calving into the sea.

signature_moves.name: Glacier Forge
signature_moves.description: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Frozen.

aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Terrin
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: The Shifting Earth Pokémon. A legendary bear of soil and magma, said to have raised the mountains of Aethel. Its roar can cause earthquakes.

signature_moves.name: Earthen Stomp
signature_moves.description: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

signature_moves.name: Mountain's Call
signature_moves.description: The user and all its allies raise their Strength and Vitality by 1 for the rest of the scene.

aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Aurabeast
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: The Star-Born Bear Pokémon. A legendary bear of cosmic energy, said to have descended from the stars. Its fur shimmers with the colors of the aurora borealis.

signature_moves.name: Aurora Borealis
signature_moves.description: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is either Burned or Paralyzed (user's choice).

aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Mischievian
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: The Trickster Fox Pokémon. A mythical Pokémon that delights in chaos and clever schemes. It is said to have stolen the light from the sky during the primordial war, forcing a truce.

signature_moves.name: Psychic Gambit
signature_moves.description: The user and the target swap all of their current status conditions and stat changes.

signature_moves.name: Trickster's Blade
signature_moves.description: On a successful hit, the user copies the last move used by the target. The copied move replaces Trickster's Blade for the rest of the scene.

aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Fimbulstorm
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: The Glacial Stillness. A primordial force of stasis and cold, one of the two beings that existed before the world. Its true form is incomprehensible.

signature_moves.name: Permafrost Prison
signature_moves.description: Hits all Pokémon on the field. On a successful hit, the target is permanently Frozen. This move has a very high chance of missing.

aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Yggdrys
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: The World-Tree. A primordial force of nature and growth, one of the two beings that existed before the world. Its true form is incomprehensible.

signature_moves.name: World-Root Anchor
signature_moves.description: Hits all non-Grass type Pokémon on the field. On a successful hit, targets are trapped and cannot switch out or flee for the rest of the scene.

signature_moves.name: Dormant Heart
signature_moves.description: The user draws its life energy inward, deactivating its Arboreal Genesis ability for 5 rounds. While the ability is suppressed, the user's Defense and Special Defense are increased by 2; this effect goes away if Life Surge is used.

signature_moves.name: Life Surge
signature_moves.description: The user unleashes a wave of pure life energy, reactivating its Arboreal Genesis ability. The user's Vitality and Insight are raised by 1 unless/until Dormant Heart is used. This move fails if the ability is already active.
